metadata.author: Microsoft - support@microsoft.com
metadata.comments: Solution template for Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace
[concat('Region to deploy solution resources -- separate from location selection',parameters('location'))]
Workspace name for Log Analytics where Microsoft Sentinel is setup

workbook1-name.defaultValue: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

| make-series TotalEvents = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain};","size":0,"title":"Events Over Time","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"timechart","graphSettings":{"type":0}},"customWidth":"60","name":"query - 12","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"55"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
  | summarize Result = count() by EventSeverity","size":3,"title":"Events Severity","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"30","name":"query - 0","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"30"}},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize dcount(SrcIpAddr) ","size":3,"title":"Unique IP Addresses","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"card","textSettings":{"style":"bignumber"}},"name":"query - 0"}]},"name":"group - 1"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId contains "THREAT"
| count ","size":3,"title":"Total Threat Events","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"card","textSettings":{"style":"bignumber"}},"name":"query - 0"}]},"name":"group - 2"},{"type":12,"content":{"version":"NotebookGroup/1.0","groupType":"editable","items":[{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId contains "THREAT"
| where isnotempty(DvcAction) 
| where EventResult contains "drop" or EventResult contains "deny" or EventResult contains "reset" or EventResult contains "block" or EventResult contains "lockout" or EventResult contains "override"
| count ","size":3,"title":"Total Threat Response","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"card","textSettings":{"style":"bignumber"}},"name":"query - 0"}]},"name":"group - 2"}]},"customWidth":"10","name":"group - 9","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"100","showBorder":true}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId contains "THREAT"
| summarize ResponseAction = count() by DvcAction","size":3,"title":"Response action ","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 3","styleSettings":{"margin":"10","padding":"10"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":" PaloAltoCDLEvent
  | where isnotempty(NetworkApplicationProtocol) 
  | summarize ApplicationLayerProtocol = count() by NetworkApplicationProtocol","size":3,"title":"Application layer protocol","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"piechart"},"customWidth":"30","name":"query - 15","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"30"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId contains "THREAT"
| where isnotempty(IndicatorThreatType) 
| summarize ThreatType = count() by IndicatorThreatType","size":3,"title":"Threat Types","timeContext":{"durationMs":7776000000},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","visualization":"barchart","gridSettings":{"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"TotalEvents","sortOrder":2}]},"sortBy":[{"itemKey":"TotalEvents","sortOrder":2}]},"customWidth":"33","name":"query - 2"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where isnotempty(DstUsername)
| sort by TimeGenerated desc 
| project User=DstUsername, ThreatEvent=strcat(iff(EventResourceId contains "THREAT", '❌', '✅')), SourceAddress=SrcIpAddr","size":0,"title":"Latest events","timeContext":{"durationMs":0},"timeContextFromParameter":"TimeRange","queryType":0,"resourceType":"microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces","gridSettings":{"rowLimit":50,"filter":true}},"customWidth":"35","name":"query - 12","styleSettings":{"maxWidth":"33"}},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where isnotempty(DstPortNumber)

| where EventResourceId contains "THREAT"
| where isnotempty(Url)
| summarize ThreatEventUrl = count() by Url

properties.description: @{workbookKey=PaloAltoCDL; logoFileName=paloalto_logo.svg; description=Sets the time name for analysis; dataTypesDependencies=System.Object[]; dataConnectorsDependencies=System.Object[]; previewImagesFileNames=System.Object[]; version=1.0.0; title=Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake; templateRelativePath=PaloAltoCDL.json; subtitle=; provider=Palo Alto Networks}.description

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLEvent Data Parser with template
properties.displayName: PaloAltoCDLEvent Data Parser template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLEvent Data Parser with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAltoCDLEvent
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'LF'
| extend EventVendor = 'Palo Alto Networks'
| extend EventProduct = 'Cortex Data Lake'
| extend EventSchemaVersion = 0.2
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend DeviceCustomNumber1 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber1", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber1),
         DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2),
         DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3)
| extend packed = pack(DeviceCustomNumber1Label, DeviceCustomNumber1
                     , DeviceCustomNumber2Label, DeviceCustomNumber2
                     , DeviceCustomNumber3Label, DeviceCustomNumber3
                     , DeviceCustomString1Label, DeviceCustomString1
                     , DeviceCustomString2Label, DeviceCustomString2
                     , DeviceCustomString3Label, DeviceCustomString3
                     , DeviceCustomString4Label, DeviceCustomString4
                     , DeviceCustomString5Label, DeviceCustomString5
                     , DeviceCustomString6Label, DeviceCustomString6
                     , DeviceCustomDate1Label, DeviceCustomDate1
                     , DeviceCustomDate2Label, DeviceCustomDate2
                     , FlexString1Label, FlexString1
                     , FlexString2Label, FlexString2
                     , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1Label, DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1
                     , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2Label, DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address1Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address1
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address2Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address2
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address3Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address3)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed)
| mv-apply AdditionalFields = extract_all(@'(?P<key>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)=(?P<value>[a-zA-Z0-9-_:@.,?%#(){}><\/"\\ ]+)', dynamic(["key","value"]), AdditionalExtensions) on (
    project packed1 = pack(tostring(AdditionalFields[0]), tostring(AdditionalFields[1]))
    | summarize bag = make_bag(packed1)
)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| extend DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Device IPv6 Address" , "")
         , DstIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Destination IPv6 Address" , "")
         , SrcIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Source IPv6 Address" , "")
         , EventResultDetails = coalesce(column_ifexists("reason",""),column_ifexists("Reason",""))
         , SrcZone = column_ifexists( "FromZone" , "")
         , DstZone = column_ifexists( "Zone" , "")
         , NetworkPackets = column_ifexists( "PacketsTotal" , int(null))
         , NetworkDuration = column_ifexists( "SessionDuration" , int(null))
         , NetworkSessionId = column_ifexists( "SessionID" , int(null))
         , EventStartTime = coalesce(column_ifexists("StartTime",datetime(null))
         , todatetime(column_ifexists("start","")))
         , EventEndTime = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventEndTime",datetime(null))
         , todatetime(column_ifexists("end","")))
         , EventType = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory",""), column_ifexists("cat",""))
| project-rename EventProductVersion = DeviceVersion
                , DvcId = DeviceExternalID
                , DvcHostname = DeviceName
                , DstNatPortNumber = DestinationTranslatedPort
                , DstHostname = DestinationHostName
                , SrcNatPortNumber = SourceTranslatedPort
                , SrcFileName = FileName
                , SrcFilePath = FilePath
                , EventMessage = Message
                , EventSeverity = LogSeverity
                , EventResult = Activity
                , DstPortNumber = DestinationPort
                , DstUserId = DestinationUserID
                , EventResourceId = DeviceEventClassID
                , HttpRequestMethod = RequestMethod
                , Url = RequestURL
                , HttpContentFormat = RequestContext
                , SrcHostname = SourceHostName
                , DvcAction = DeviceAction
                , DstDomain = DestinationNTDomain
                , SrcPortNumber = SourcePort
                , DvcInboundInterface = DeviceInboundInterface
                , DvcOutboundInterface = DeviceOutboundInterface
                , NetworkProtocol = Protocol
                , NetworkApplicationProtocol = ApplicationProtocol
                , SrcDomain = SourceNTDomain
                , SrcUserId = SourceUserID
                , DstBytes = ReceivedBytes
                , SrcBytes = SentBytes
| extend EventTimeIngested = todatetime(ReceiptTime)
| extend SrcNatIpAddr = case(isempty(SourceIP), SourceTranslatedAddress, 
                            pack_array(SourceTranslatedAddress,SourceIP))
| extend DstNatIpAddr = case(isempty(DestinationIP), DestinationTranslatedAddress,
                            pack_array(DestinationTranslatedAddress, DestinationIP))
| extend suser0 = column_ifexists("suser0","")
       , duser0 = column_ifexists("duser0","")
 | extend SrcUsername = case(isempty(suser0), SourceUserName, 
                             pack_array(SourceUserName,suser0))
 | extend DstUsername = case(isempty(duser0), DestinationUserName,
                             pack_array(DestinationUserName,duser0))
| project-away ReceiptTime
              , Type
              , StartTime
              , EndTime
              , DeviceVendor
              , DeviceProduct
              , duser0
              , DestinationUserName
              , suser0
              , SourceUserName
              , AdditionalExtensions
              , DestinationTranslatedAddress
              , DestinationIP
              , SourceTranslatedAddress
              , SourceIP
              , DeviceCustomNumber1Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber1
              , DeviceCustomNumber2Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber2
              , DeviceCustomNumber3Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber3
              , DeviceCustomString1Label
              , DeviceCustomString1
              , DeviceCustomString2Label
              , DeviceCustomString2
              , DeviceCustomString3Label
              , DeviceCustomString3
              , DeviceCustomString4Label
              , DeviceCustomString4
              , DeviceCustomString5Label
              , DeviceCustomString5
              , DeviceCustomString6Label
              , DeviceCustomString6
              , DeviceCustomDate1Label
              , DeviceCustomDate1
              , DeviceCustomDate2Label
              , DeviceCustomDate2
              , FlexString1Label
              , FlexString1
              , FlexString2Label
              , FlexString2
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address1Label
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address1
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address2Label
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address2
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address3Label
              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address3
              , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1Label
              , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1
              , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2Label
              , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.displayName: PaloAltoCDLEvent
properties.query:
CommonSecurityLog
| where DeviceVendor =~ 'Palo Alto Networks'
| where DeviceProduct =~ 'LF'
| extend EventVendor = 'Palo Alto Networks'
| extend EventProduct = 'Cortex Data Lake'
| extend EventSchemaVersion = 0.2
| extend EventCount = 1
| extend DeviceCustomNumber1 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber1", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber1),
         DeviceCustomNumber2 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber2", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber2),
         DeviceCustomNumber3 = coalesce(column_ifexists("FieldDeviceCustomNumber3", long(null)),DeviceCustomNumber3)
| extend packed = pack(DeviceCustomNumber1Label, DeviceCustomNumber1
                     , DeviceCustomNumber2Label, DeviceCustomNumber2
                     , DeviceCustomNumber3Label, DeviceCustomNumber3
                     , DeviceCustomString1Label, DeviceCustomString1
                     , DeviceCustomString2Label, DeviceCustomString2
                     , DeviceCustomString3Label, DeviceCustomString3
                     , DeviceCustomString4Label, DeviceCustomString4
                     , DeviceCustomString5Label, DeviceCustomString5
                     , DeviceCustomString6Label, DeviceCustomString6
                     , DeviceCustomDate1Label, DeviceCustomDate1
                     , DeviceCustomDate2Label, DeviceCustomDate2
                     , FlexString1Label, FlexString1
                     , FlexString2Label, FlexString2
                     , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1Label, DeviceCustomFloatingPoint1
                     , DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2Label, DeviceCustomFloatingPoint2
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address1Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address1
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address2Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address2
                     , DeviceCustomIPv6Address3Label, DeviceCustomIPv6Address3)
| evaluate bag_unpack(packed)
| mv-apply AdditionalFields = extract_all(@'(?P<key>[a-zA-Z0-9-_]+)=(?P<value>[a-zA-Z0-9-_:@.,?%#(){}><\/"\\ ]+)', dynamic(["key","value"]), AdditionalExtensions) on (
    project packed1 = pack(tostring(AdditionalFields[0]), tostring(AdditionalFields[1]))
    | summarize bag = make_bag(packed1)
)
| evaluate bag_unpack(bag)
| extend DvcIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Device IPv6 Address" , "")
         , DstIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Destination IPv6 Address" , "")
         , SrcIpAddr = column_ifexists( "Source IPv6 Address" , "")
         , EventResultDetails = coalesce(column_ifexists("reason",""),column_ifexists("Reason",""))
         , SrcZone = column_ifexists( "FromZone" , "")
         , DstZone = column_ifexists( "Zone" , "")
         , NetworkPackets = column_ifexists( "PacketsTotal" , int(null))
         , NetworkDuration = column_ifexists( "SessionDuration" , int(null))
         , NetworkSessionId = column_ifexists( "SessionID" , int(null))
         , EventStartTime = coalesce(column_ifexists("StartTime",datetime(null))
         , todatetime(column_ifexists("start","")))
         , EventEndTime = coalesce(column_ifexists("EventEndTime",datetime(null))
         , todatetime(column_ifexists("end","")))
         , EventType = coalesce(column_ifexists("DeviceEventCategory",""), column_ifexists("cat",""))
| project-rename EventProductVersion = DeviceVersion
                , DvcId = DeviceExternalID
                , DvcHostname = DeviceName
                , DstNatPortNumber = DestinationTranslatedPort
                , DstHostname = DestinationHostName
                , SrcNatPortNumber = SourceTranslatedPort
                , SrcFileName = FileName
                , SrcFilePath = FilePath
                , EventMessage = Message
                , EventSeverity = LogSeverity
                , EventResult = Activity
                , DstPortNumber = DestinationPort
                , DstUserId = DestinationUserID
                , EventResourceId = DeviceEventClassID
                , HttpRequestMethod = RequestMethod
                , Url = RequestURL
                , HttpContentFormat = RequestContext
                , SrcHostname = SourceHostName
                , DvcAction = DeviceAction
                , DstDomain = DestinationNTDomain
                , SrcPortNumber = SourcePort
                , DvcInboundInterface = DeviceInboundInterface
                , DvcOutboundInterface = DeviceOutboundInterface
                , NetworkProtocol = Protocol
                , NetworkApplicationProtocol = ApplicationProtocol
                , SrcDomain = SourceNTDomain
                , SrcUserId = SourceUserID
                , DstBytes = ReceivedBytes
                , SrcBytes = SentBytes
| extend EventTimeIngested = todatetime(ReceiptTime)
| extend SrcNatIpAddr = case(isempty(SourceIP), SourceTranslatedAddress, 
                            pack_array(SourceTranslatedAddress,SourceIP))
| extend DstNatIpAddr = case(isempty(DestinationIP), DestinationTranslatedAddress,
                            pack_array(DestinationTranslatedAddress, DestinationIP))
| extend suser0 = column_ifexists("suser0","")
       , duser0 = column_ifexists("duser0","")
 | extend SrcUsername = case(isempty(suser0), SourceUserName, 
                             pack_array(SourceUserName,suser0))
 | extend DstUsername = case(isempty(duser0), DestinationUserName,
                             pack_array(DestinationUserName,duser0))
| project-away ReceiptTime
              , Type
              , StartTime
              , EndTime
              , DeviceVendor
              , DeviceProduct
              , duser0
              , DestinationUserName
              , suser0
              , SourceUserName
              , AdditionalExtensions
              , DestinationTranslatedAddress
              , DestinationIP
              , SourceTranslatedAddress
              , SourceIP
              , DeviceCustomNumber1Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber1
              , DeviceCustomNumber2Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber2
              , DeviceCustomNumber3Label
              , DeviceCustomNumber3
              , DeviceCustomString1Label
              , DeviceCustomString1
              , DeviceCustomString2Label
              , DeviceCustomString2

              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address2

              , DeviceCustomIPv6Address3

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 1 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLCriticalEventResult_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Critical event result
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where EventSeverity has 'critical'  or tostring(ThreatSeverity) has_any ('high', 'critical')
| extend UrlCustomEntity = Url, AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 1

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 2 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLFilePermissionWithPutRequest_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - File permission with PUT or POST request
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where HttpRequestMethod contains "PUT" or HttpRequestMethod contains "POST"
| where isnotempty(FilePermission)
| summarize Permissions = count() by FilePermission, DstUsername
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows file permission with PUT or POST request

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 2

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 3 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLIPsByPorts_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Destination ports by IPs
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(DstPortNumber)
| summarize IP_Dst = make_set(tostring(DstNatIpAddr)) by DstPortNumber
| extend IPCustomEntity = IP_Dst

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows destination ports by IP address.

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 3

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 4 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLIncompleteApplicationProtocol_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Incomplete application protocol
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where NetworkApplicationProtocol has_any ("incomplete", "Not-Applicable", "insufficient")
| extend UrlCustomEntity = Url, IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 4

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 5 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLMultiDenyResultbyUser_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Multiple Deny result by user
properties.query:
let threshold = 20;
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where DvcAction has 'deny'
| summarize DenyCount = count() by DvcAction, DstUsername
| where DenyCount > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows multiple Deny results by user

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 5

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 6 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLOutdatedAgentVersions_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Agent versions
properties.query:
let cur_ver = dynamic(['0.1']); //put latest agent version here
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(PanOSAgentVersion)
| where PanOSAgentVersion != cur_ver
| project SrcIpAddr, PanOSAgentVersion
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows agents which are not updated to the latest version

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 6

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 7 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLOutdatedConfigVersions_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Outdated config vesions
properties.query:
let cur_ver = dynamic(['0.1']); //put latest config version here
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(PanOSConfigVersion)
| where PanOSConfigVersion != cur_ver
| project SrcIpAddr, PanOSConfigVersion
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 7

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 8 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLRareApplicationLayerProtocol_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Rare application layer protocols
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(NetworkApplicationProtocol) 
| summarize ApplicationLayerProtocol = count() by NetworkApplicationProtocol
| top 10 by ApplicationLayerProtocol asc
| extend UrlCustomEntity = NetworkApplicationProtocol

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows Rare application layer protocols

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 8

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 9 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLRareFileRequests_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Rare files observed
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(SrcFileName)
| summarize RareFiles = count() by SrcFileName
| top 20 by RareFiles asc
| extend FileCustomEntity = SrcFileName

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 9

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 10 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLRarePortsbyUser_HuntingQueries Hunting Query with template version 2.0.2

properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Rare ports by user
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(24h)
| where isnotempty(DstPortNumber) 
| summarize RarePorts = count() by DstPortNumber, DstIpAddr, DstUsername
| top 20 by RarePorts asc 
| extend IPCustomEntity = DstIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

tags.name: description
tags.value: Query shows rare ports by user.

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Hunting Query 10

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake data connector with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake template

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake data connector with template version 2.0.2

connectorUiConfig.title: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake (CDL)
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown: The [Palo Alto Networks CDL](https://www.paloaltonetworks.com/cortex/cortex-data-lake) data connector provides the capability to ingest [CDL logs](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cortex/cortex-data-lake/log-forwarding-schema-reference/log-forwarding-schema-overview.html) into Microsoft Sentinel.
connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**PaloAltoCDLEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-paloaltocdl-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

sampleQueries.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
 | where isnotempty(DstIpAddr)
    | summarize count() by DstIpAddr
 | top 10 by count_

dataTypes.name: CommonSecurityLog (PaloAltoNetworksCDL)
dataTypes.lastDataReceivedQuery:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
            | summarize Time = max(TimeGenerated)
            | where isnotempty(Time)

value:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
            | summarize LastLogReceived = max(TimeGenerated)
            | project IsConnected = LastLogReceived > ago(1d)

resourceProvider.permissionsDisplayText: read and write permissions are required.

read permissions to shared keys for the workspace are required. [See the documentation to learn more about workspace keys](https://docs.microsoft.com/azure/azure-monitor/platform/agent-windows#obtain-workspace-id-and-key).

instructionSteps.description: >**NOTE:** This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**PaloAltoCDLEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-paloaltocdl-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

Install and configure the Linux agent to collect your Common Event Format (CEF) Syslog messages and forward them to Microsoft Sentinel.

> Notice that the data from all regions will be stored in the selected workspace

innerSteps.title: 1.1 Select or create a Linux machine
innerSteps.description: Select or create a Linux machine that Microsoft Sentinel will use as the proxy between your security solution and Microsoft Sentinel this machine can be on your on-prem environment, Azure or other clouds.

innerSteps.title: 1.2 Install the CEF collector on the Linux machine
innerSteps.description:
Install the Microsoft Monitoring Agent on your Linux machine and configure the machine to listen on the necessary port and forward messages to your Microsoft Sentinel workspace. The CEF collector collects CEF messages on port 514 TCP.

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version.

> 2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine.

parameters.label: Run the following command to install and apply the CEF collector:

instructionSteps.title: 1. Linux Syslog agent configuration

instructionSteps.description: [Follow the instructions](https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/cortex/cortex-data-lake/cortex-data-lake-getting-started/get-started-with-log-forwarding-app/forward-logs-from-logging-service-to-syslog-server.html) to configure logs forwarding from Cortex Data Lake to a Syslog Server.
instructionSteps.title: 2.  Configure Cortex Data Lake to forward logs to a Syslog Server using CEF

instructionSteps.description:
Follow the instructions to validate your connectivity:

Open Log Analytics to check if the logs are received using the CommonSecurityLog schema.

>It may take about 20 minutes until the connection streams data to your workspace.

If the logs are not received, run the following connectivity validation script:

> 1. Make sure that you have Python on your machine using the following command: python -version

>2. You must have elevated permissions (sudo) on your machine

parameters.label: Run the following command to validate your connectivity:

instructionSteps.title: 3. Validate connection

instructionSteps.description:
Make sure to configure the machine's security according to your organization's security policy


[Learn more >](https://aka.ms/SecureCEF)
instructionSteps.title: 4. Secure your machine

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake
Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

connectorUiConfig.additionalRequirementBanner: This data connector depends on a parser based on a Kusto Function to work as expected [**PaloAltoCDLEvent**](https://aka.ms/sentinel-paloaltocdl-parser) which is deployed with the Microsoft Sentinel Solution.

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 1 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLConflictingMacAddress_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects several users with the same MAC address.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - MAC address conflict
properties.query:
let threshold = 2;
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where isnotempty(DestinationMACAddress) and isnotempty(DstUsername)
| summarize UserSet = make_set(DstUsername) by DestinationMACAddress
| extend Users = array_length(UserSet)
| where Users >= threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = UserSet, IPCustomEntity = DestinationMACAddress

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 1

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 2 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLDroppingSessionWithSentTraffic_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects dropping or denying session with traffic.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Dropping or denying session with traffic
properties.query:
let threshold = 100;
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where EventResult has_any ("deny", "drop", "reject") 
| where tolong(DstBytes) > 0
| where tolong(NetworkPackets) > 0
| summarize count() by SrcIpAddr, DstUsername, bin(TimeGenerated, 10m)
| where count_ > threshold
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername, IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 2

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 3 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLFileTypeWasChanged_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects when file type changed.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - File type changed
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'THREAT'
| where EventResult =~ 'file'
| where FileType != OldFileType
| extend FileCustomEntity = SrcFileName, AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 3

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 4 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLInboundRiskPorts_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects inbound connection to high risk ports.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Inbound connection to high risk ports
properties.query:
let HighRiskPorts = dynamic(['21', '22', '23', '25', '53', '443', '110', '135', '137', '138', '139', '1433', '1434']);
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where ipv4_is_private(SrcIpAddr) == false
| where DstPortNumber in (HighRiskPorts)
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 4

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 5 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLPossibleAttackWithoutResponse_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects possible attack without response.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Possible attack without response
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'THREAT'
| where DvcAction !has "block" or DvcAction !has "override" or DvcAction !has "deny"
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername, IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, UrlCustomEntity = Url

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 5

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 6 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLPossibleFlooding_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects possible flooding.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Possible flooding
properties.query:
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where isnotempty(NetworkSessionId)
| where DstBytes == 0 and tolong(NetworkPackets) > 0
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername, IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 6

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 7 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLPossiblePortScan_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects possible port scan.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Possible port scan
properties.query:
let threshold = 10;
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where isnotempty(DstPortNumber) and isnotempty(SrcIpAddr)
| summarize PortSet = make_set(DstPortNumber) by SrcIpAddr, bin(TimeGenerated, 5m)
| where array_length(PortSet) > threshold
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 7

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 8 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLPrivilegesWasChanged_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects changing of user privileges.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - User privileges was changed
properties.query:
let q_period = 14d;
let dt_lookBack = 24h;
let p = PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated between (ago(q_period)..ago(dt_lookBack))
| summarize OldPrivileges = make_set(DestinationUserPrivileges) by DstUsername;
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where TimeGenerated > ago(dt_lookBack)
| summarize NewPrivileges = make_set(DestinationUserPrivileges) by DstUsername
| join kind=innerunique (p) on DstUsername
| where tostring(OldPrivileges) != tostring(NewPrivileges)
| extend AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 8

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 9 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLPutMethodInHighRiskFileType_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects put and post method request in high risk file type.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Put and post method request in high risk file type
properties.query:
let HighRiskFileType = dynamic(['.exe', '.msi', '.msp', '.jar', '.bat', '.cmd', '.js', '.jse', 'ws', '.ps1', '.ps2', '.msh']);
PaloAltoCDLEvent
| where EventResourceId =~ 'THREAT'
| where EventResult =~ 'file'
| where HttpRequestMethod has_any ("POST", "PUT")
| where FileType in (HighRiskFileType)
| extend FileCustomEntity = SrcFileName

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 9

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 10 with template
properties.displayName: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule template

properties.description: PaloAltoCDLUnexpectedCountries_AnalyticalRules Analytics Rule with template version 2.0.2
Detects suspicious connections from forbidden countries.
properties.displayName: PaloAlto - Forbidden countries
properties.query:
let bl_countries = dynamic(['CH', 'RU']);
PaloAltoCDLEvent 
| where EventResourceId =~ 'TRAFFIC'
| where MaliciousIPCountry  in (bl_countries)
| summarize count() by DstUsername, SrcIpAddr 
| extend IPCustomEntity = SrcIpAddr, AccountCustomEntity = DstUsername

properties.description: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake Analytics Rule 10

source.name: Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake
Palo Alto Networks Cortex Data Lake
